name: Crane Riposte

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Crane Style, Crane Wing, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.

sections.text: You take only a Ð1 penalty on attack rolls for fighting defensively. Whenever you deflect an opponent's attack using Crane Wing or lose the dodge bonus from Crane Wing because an attack missed you by 4 or less, you can make an attack of opportunity against the attacker after the attack misses.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th
description: You use your defensive abilities to make overpowering counterattacks.
